body.raw:
<flowspec-routes xmlns="urn:opendaylight:params:xml:ns:yang:bgp-flowspec">
    <flowspec-route>
      <route-key>bar</route-key>
      <flowspec>
        <destination-prefix>192.168.0.1/32</destination-prefix>
        <component-type>destination-prefix</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <source-prefix>10.0.0.1/32</source-prefix>
        <component-type>source-prefix</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <protocol-ips>
          <op>equals end-of-list</op>
          <value>6</value>              
        </protocol-ips>
        <component-type>protocol-ip</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <ports>
          <op>equals end-of-list</op>
          <value>80</value>
        </ports>
        <component-type>port</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <destination-ports>
          <op>greater-than</op>
          <value>8080</value>
        </destination-ports>
        <destination-ports>
          <op>and-bit less-than end-of-list</op>
          <value>8088</value>
        </destination-ports>
        <component-type>destination-port</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <source-ports>
          <op>greater-than end-of-list</op>
          <value>1024</value>
        </source-ports>
        <component-type>source-port</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <types>
          <op>equals end-of-list</op>
          <value>0</value>
        </types>
        <component-type>icmp-type</component-type>
      </flowspec>
        <flowspec>
        <codes>
          <op>equals end-of-list</op>
          <value>0</value>
        </codes>
        <component-type>icmp-code</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <tcp-flags>
          <op>match end-of-list</op>
          <value>32</value>
        </tcp-flags>
        <component-type>tcp-flags</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <packet-lengths>
          <op>greater-than</op>
          <value>400</value>
        </packet-lengths>
        <packet-lengths>
          <op>and-bit less-than end-of-list</op>
           <value>500</value>
        </packet-lengths>
        <component-type>packet-length</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <dscps>
          <op>equals end-of-list</op>
          <value>20</value>
        </dscps>
        <component-type>dscp</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <flowspec>
        <fragments>
          <op>match end-of-list</op>
          <value>first</value>
        </fragments>
        <component-type>fragment</component-type>
      </flowspec>
      <attributes>
        <origin>
          <value>igp</value>
        </origin>
        <as-path/>
        <local-pref>
          <pref>100</pref>
        </local-pref>
        <extended-communities>
          <comm-type>128</comm-type>
          <comm-sub-type>7</comm-sub-type>
          <traffic-action-extended-community>
            <sample>true</sample>
            <terminal-action>false</terminal-action>
          </traffic-action-extended-community>
        </extended-communities>
      </attributes>
    </flowspec-route>
  </flowspec-routes>

item.name: POST EVPN IMET and MAC route
POST EVPN MAC route - no PMSI

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.
